content: @Mara I know you mentioned wanting to do this, but not sure if this is something we're still expecting to happen or it's gone by in my notifications without me noticing :)
we're just ~3 weeks out from the release date though so seems like it's around time to do that
yeah, haven't started it yet. thanks for the reminder. i wanted to fix the debug_assert edition thing before starting it. i'll probably have time to do that tomorrow.
@Mara I don't suppose you have any desire to do another crater run?
